ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
function getZipContent(url){
var res=ByteArrayOutputStream();
var map= HashMap()
map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
var v1=java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
//java.log(v1)
var bis=ByteArrayInputStream(v1);
var zis=ZipInputStream(bis);
var entry=null;
 while((entry= zis.getNextEntry())!=null){
      if(entry.getName()=="chapter.json"){
        var buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
        var length;
        while ((length = zis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                res.write(buffer, 0, length);
              }
        zis.closeEntry();
        
         
     }else{}
 }
return res.toString();



}
}
//java.log("SSSS"+baseUrl)
result=getZipContent(baseUrl)
//java.log(result);

</js>$.data[*]

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
    function getZipContent(url){
        let bOutput = ByteArrayOutputStream();
        let map = HashMap()
        map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
        let body = java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
        let bInput = ByteArrayInputStream(body);
        let zInput = ZipInputStream(bInput);
        let zEntry = null;
        while((zEntry= zInput.getNextEntry())!=null){
            if(zEntry.getName().equals("detail.json")){
                let buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
                let length;
                while ((length = zInput.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                    bOutput.write(buffer, 0, length);
                }
                zInput.closeEntry();
            }
        }
        return bOutput.toString();
    }
}
getZipContent(baseUrl)
</js>$.data

                }
                zInput.closeEntry();

        }
        return bOutput.toString();
    }
}

var bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.bookId'));

if(!bid>0){
bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.id'));
}
java.put("bid",bid);
var subpath=parseInt((1999+bid)/2000);
var url="http://statics.ywpxg.com/static/book/zip/"+subpath+"/"+bid+".zip";
//java.log(url)
result=url;</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
function getZipContent(url){
var res=ByteArrayOutputStream();
var map= HashMap()
map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
var v1=java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
//java.log(v1)
var bis=ByteArrayInputStream(v1);
var zis=ZipInputStream(bis);
var entry=null;
 while((entry= zis.getNextEntry())!=null){
      if(entry.getName()=="chapter.json"){
        var buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
        var length;
        while ((length = zis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                res.write(buffer, 0, length);
              }
        zis.closeEntry();
        
         
     }else{}
 }
return res.toString();



}
}
//java.log("SSSS"+baseUrl)
result=getZipContent(baseUrl)
//java.log(result);

</js>$.data[*]

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DESè§£å¯†ç»“æŸ

result=String(decode(content)+say);

//è·å–è¯„è®ºå¼€å¯

}

comment=""?"":"\nâ—æœ€æ–°è¯„è®ºï¼š\n"+comment+"\n-å®Œ-";

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DESè§£å¯†ç»“æŸ

</js>

function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2äº¿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2ä¸‡')
    .replace(/\.0([ä¸‡äº¿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' Â· ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + 'ç‚¹å‡»');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + 'æœˆç¥¨');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' Â· ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2äº¿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2ä¸‡')
    .replace(/\.0([ä¸‡äº¿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' Â· ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + 'ç‚¹å‡»');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + 'æœˆç¥¨');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' Â· ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>

JSON.parse(String(result))

    };
  });
</js>

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2äº¿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2ä¸‡')
    .replace(/\.0([ä¸‡äº¿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' Â· ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + 'ç‚¹å‡»');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + 'æœˆç¥¨');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' Â· ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('ä½œå“ç›¸å…³'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^æ­£æ–‡\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author@put:{author:$.author}
ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
var bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.bookId'));
if(!bid>0){
bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.id'));
}
java.put("bid",bid);
var subpath=parseInt((1999+bid)/2000);
var url="http://statics.rungean.com/static/book/zip/"+subpath+"/"+bid+".zip";
result=url;</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.name@put:{name:$.name}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
function getZipContent(url){
var res=ByteArrayOutputStream();
var map= HashMap()
map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
var v1=java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
//java.log(v1)
var bis=ByteArrayInputStream(v1);
var zis=ZipInputStream(bis);
var entry=null;
 while((entry= zis.getNextEntry())!=null){
      if(entry.getName()=="chapter.json"){
        var buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
        var length;
        while ((length = zis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                res.write(buffer, 0, length);
              }
        zis.closeEntry();
        
         
     }else{}
 }
return res.toString();



}
}
//java.log("SSSS"+baseUrl)
result=getZipContent(baseUrl)
//java.log(result);
</js>$.data[*]

searchUrl:
<js> var body = {
  "sort": "default",
  "page": 1,
  "q": "{{key}}",
  "rootKind": "",
  "query": "
    query getFilterWorksList($works_ids: [ID!]) {
      worksList(worksIds: $works_ids) {
        
    
    title
    cover
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel
  
    
    url
    title
  
    
    author {
      name
      url
    }
    origAuthor {
      name
      url
    }
    translator {
      name
      url
    }
  
    
    abstract
    editorHighlight
  
    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    isNew
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
  
  
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
  
    isInLibrary
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
  
        id
        isOrigin
      }
    }
  ",
  "variables": {}
};
var option = {"method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(body) }; "https://read.douban.com/j/search_v2," + JSON.stringify(option) </js>

//DESåŠ å¯†å¼€å§‹
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util  
);
with(javaImport){
function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
//DESåŠ å¯†ç»“æŸ

var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:String(encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey)),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: String(java.md5Encode(data.timeStamp + md5Key))
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}
var data ={
    timeStamp:Date.now(),
    bigType:"0",
    pageSize:100,
    pageNum:parseInt(java.get('page'))
};

if(baseUrl.match(/categoryId/)){
data.categoryId=baseUrl.match(/categoryId=(\d+)/)[1];
url=getPostUrl(data,'qryCategoryResList')
}else{
data.content=String(java.get('key'));
url=getPostUrl(data,'qrySearchList')
}

java.ajax(url)

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
function getZipContent(url){
var res=ByteArrayOutputStream();
var map= HashMap()
map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
var v1=java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
//java.log(v1)
var bis=ByteArrayInputStream(v1);
var zis=ZipInputStream(bis);
var entry=null;
 while((entry= zis.getNextEntry())!=null){
      if(entry.getName()=="chapter.json"){
        var buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
        var length;
        while ((length = zis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                res.write(buffer, 0, length);
              }
        zis.closeEntry();
        
         
     }else{}
 }
return res.toString();



}
}

Json.push(list1[j])
}
}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>

var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(Â·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.security,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){


function decode(str,key){
if(arguments.length==1){
key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0="),"AES");
}else{key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray(key),"AES")}
let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
    function getZipContent(url){
        let bOutput = ByteArrayOutputStream();
        let map = HashMap()
        map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
        let body = java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
        let bInput = ByteArrayInputStream(body);
        let zInput = ZipInputStream(bInput);
        let zEntry = null;
        while((zEntry= zInput.getNextEntry())!=null){
            if(zEntry.getName().equals("detail.json")){
                let buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
                let length;
                while ((length = zInput.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                    bOutput.write(buffer, 0, length);
                }
                zInput.closeEntry();
            }
        }
        return bOutput.toString();
    }
}
getZipContent(baseUrl)
</js>$.data

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
    function getZipContent(url){
        let bOutput = ByteArrayOutputStream();
        let map = HashMap()
        map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
        let body = java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
        let bInput = ByteArrayInputStream(body);
        let zInput = ZipInputStream(bInput);
        let zEntry = null;
        while((zEntry= zInput.getNextEntry())!=null){
            if(zEntry.getName().equals("detail.json")){
                let buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
                let length;
                while ((length = zInput.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                    bOutput.write(buffer, 0, length);
                }
                zInput.closeEntry();
            }
        }
        return bOutput.toString();
    }
}
getZipContent(baseUrl)
</js>$.data

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
    function getZipContent(url){
        let bOutput = ByteArrayOutputStream();
        let map = HashMap()
        map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
        let body = java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
        let bInput = ByteArrayInputStream(body);
        let zInput = ZipInputStream(bInput);
        let zEntry = null;
        while((zEntry= zInput.getNextEntry())!=null){
            if(zEntry.getName().equals("chapter.json")){
                let buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
                let length;
                while ((length = zInput.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                    bOutput.write(buffer, 0, length);
                }
                zInput.closeEntry();
            }
        }
        return bOutput.toString();
    }
}
getZipContent(baseUrl)
</js>$.data

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
    function getZipContent(url){
        let bOutput = ByteArrayOutputStream();
        let map = HashMap()
        map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
        let body = java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
        let bInput = ByteArrayInputStream(body);
        let zInput = ZipInputStream(bInput);
        let zEntry = null;
        while((zEntry= zInput.getNextEntry())!=null){
            if(zEntry.getName().equals("detail.json")){
                let buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
                let length;
                while ((length = zInput.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                    bOutput.write(buffer, 0, length);
                }
                zInput.closeEntry();
            }
        }
        return bOutput.toString();
    }
}
getZipContent(baseUrl)
</js>$.data

    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
    function getZipContent(url){
        let bOutput = ByteArrayOutputStream();
        let map = HashMap()
        map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
        let body = java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
        let bInput = ByteArrayInputStream(body);
        let zInput = ZipInputStream(bInput);
        let zEntry = null;
        while((zEntry= zInput.getNextEntry())!=null){
            if(zEntry.getName().equals("chapter.json")){
                let buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
                let length;
                while ((length = zInput.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                    bOutput.write(buffer, 0, length);
                }
                zInput.closeEntry();
            }
        }
        return bOutput.toString();
    }
}
getZipContent(baseUrl)
</js>$.data

                zInput.closeEntry();
            }
        }
        return bOutput.toString();
    }
}

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
    function getZipContent(url){
        let bOutput = ByteArrayOutputStream();
        let map = HashMap()
        map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
        let body = java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
        let bInput = ByteArrayInputStream(body);
        let zInput = ZipInputStream(bInput);
        let zEntry = null;
        while((zEntry= zInput.getNextEntry())!=null){
            if(zEntry.getName().equals("chapter.json")){
                let buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
                let length;
                while ((length = zInput.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                    bOutput.write(buffer, 0, length);
                }
                zInput.closeEntry();
            }
        }
        return bOutput.toString();
    }
}
getZipContent(baseUrl)
</js>$.data

with(javaImport){
    function getZipContent(url){
        let bOutput = ByteArrayOutputStream();
        let map = HashMap()
        map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
        let body = java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
        let bInput = ByteArrayInputStream(body);
        let zInput = ZipInputStream(bInput);
        let zEntry = null;
        while((zEntry= zInput.getNextEntry())!=null){
            if(zEntry.getName().equals("detail.json")){
                let buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
                let length;
                while ((length = zInput.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                    bOutput.write(buffer, 0, length);
                }
                zInput.closeEntry();
            }
        }
        return bOutput.toString();
    }
}

function sign(list){
    var sb='2bb6ffe20b1eff00';
    list=list.sort();
    for(var i=0;i<list.length;i++){if(i==0){sb+=list[i];}else{sb+="&";sb+=list[i];}}
    sb+="cabf8a3adca20e831d7e96267f709032";
    return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase();
}

result=result.replace(/onclick="payChapter\('(.*?)','.*?',.*?\);"/g,'href="$1"');
doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
list=doc.select("#episodes a,#extra_episodes a");
if(String(list).match(/class="price_tag_icon">ï¿¥/)){
result=list
}else{
list=doc.select("#episodes a");
list2=doc.select("#extra_episodes a");
a=list.toArray().reverse().map(x=>({text:x.text(),
href:x.attr('href')}));
b=list2.toArray().map(x=>({text:x.text(),
href:x.attr('href')}));
result=a.concat(b)
}</js>

<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
Â    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
Â    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
Â    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
Â    bytes.forEach(a => {
Â Â Â    bt = a & 0xff;
Â Â Â    if (bt < 16) {
Â Â Â Â Â    stringBuffer.append("0");
Â Â   Â  }
Â Â Â    stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
Â    });
Â    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)
